name: Everyday Side Salad
ingredients: 2 ounces leaf lettuce or fresh baby spinach, roughly torn (about 2 cups)
utensils: Salad tongs or large spoons for tossing

instructions.en: Roughly tear the leaf lettuce or baby spinach and place in a salad bowl.
instructions.sk: Zľahka natrhajte listový šalát alebo baby špenát a vložte do misy na šalát.
instructions.ja: リーフレタスまたはベビーホウレンソウを大まかに手でちぎり、サラダボウルに入れます。

instructions.en: Chop the tomato and add to the bowl.
instructions.sk: Nakrájajte paradajku a pridajte do misy.
instructions.ja: トマトを刻んでボウルに加えます。

instructions.en: Slice the cucumber and add to the bowl.
instructions.sk: Nakrájajte uhorku na plátky a pridajte do misy.
instructions.ja: キュウリをスライスしてボウルに加えます。

instructions.en: Add your chosen dressing to the vegetables.
instructions.sk: Pridajte k zelenine váš vybraný dresing.
instructions.ja: 野菜に選んだドレッシングを加えます。

instructions.en: Toss all the vegetables and dressing together until well combined.
instructions.sk: Všetku zeleninu a dresing spolu dobre premiešajte.
instructions.ja: 全ての野菜とドレッシングをよく混ぜ合わせます。

instructions.en: Top the salad with freshly ground black pepper.
instructions.sk: Posypte šalát čerstvo mletým čiernym korením.
instructions.ja: サラダの上に挽きたての黒コショウをふりかけます。

instructions.en: Sprinkle chopped chives over the salad.
instructions.ja: 刻んだチャイブをサラダの上にふりかけます。

instructions.en: Finally, add the sunflower kernels on top of the salad.
instructions.sk: Nakoniec pridajte na vrch šalátu slnečnicové semienka.
instructions.ja: 最後に、サラダの上にヒマワリの種をトッピングします。

notes: This Everyday Side Salad is a simple, versatile, and keto-friendly dish that can accompany a wide variety of main courses. It's quick to prepare and can be easily customized based on personal preferences or what's available in your kitchen. The sunflower kernels add a nice crunch and healthy fats, while the choice of dressing allows you to vary the flavor profile. For a more substantial keto meal, you could add some grilled chicken, hard-boiled eggs, or avocado. Remember to choose a low-carb dressing to keep the salad keto-friendly.
